<style>
    .header-container {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        width: 100%;
        padding: 15px 30px;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1000;
    }

    .header-content {
        max-width: 1400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .logo-container {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
    }

    .logo-image {
        height: 60px;
        width: auto;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    }

    .logo-image:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }

    .nav-container {
        flex: 1;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }

    .nav-list {
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        gap: 40px;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .nav-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        padding: 8px 0;
        position: relative;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .nav-link:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        width: 0;
        height: 2px;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        background-color: #00FF00;
        transition: width 0.3s ease;
    }

    .nav-link:hover:after {
        width: 100%;
    }

    /* Dropdown Styles */
    .dropdown {
        position: relative;
    }

    .dropdown-content {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        min-width: 220px;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.15);
        border-radius: 4px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);
        top: 100%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        padding: 8px 0;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1002;
    }

    .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
        display: block;
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .dropdown-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        display: block;
        font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: 500;
        text-align: left;
        white-space: nowrap;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
    }

    .dropdown-link:hover {
        background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        padding-left: 25px;
    }

    .submenu {
        left: 100%;
        top: -8px;
        transform: none;
    }

    .dropdown:hover > .dropdown-content.submenu {
        display: block;
    }

    /* Mobile Menu Toggle */
    .menu-toggle {
        display: none;
        background: none;
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        padding: 5px;
        margin-left: 10px;
        z-index: 1003;
    }

    .menu-toggle span {
        display: block;
        width: 25px;
        height: 3px;
        margin: 5px 0;
        background: #00FF00;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* Responsive Styles */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .nav-list {
            gap: 30px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 10px 20px;
        }
        .menu-toggle {
            display: block;
        }
        .nav-container {
            position: fixed; /* Changed from absolute to fixed */
            top: 80px;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: max-height 0.5s ease;
            z-index: 1001;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }
        .nav-container.active {
            max-height: 85vh; /* Limit height to prevent overflow issues */
            overflow-y: auto;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        .nav-list {
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 20px;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 16px;
            width: 100%;
            display: block;
            padding: 10px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Remove underline animation for mobile */
        .nav-link:after {
            display: none;
        }
        /* Add explicit plus indicator for dropdowns */
        .dropdown > .nav-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown.active > .nav-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        .dropdown-content {
            position: static;
            width: 100%;
            transform: none;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            opacity: 1;
            display: block;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 15px;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-content {
            max-height: 1000px;
            padding: 8px 0;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Style submenu dropdowns in mobile */
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link {
            padding-right: 30px; /* Space for plus indicator */
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown.active > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        /* Fix submenu position */
        .submenu {
            position: static;
            margin-left: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 8px 15px; /* Reduce padding for smaller screens */
        }
        .header-content {
            flex-direction: row;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .logo-image {
            height: 45px;
        }
        .nav-container {
            top: 62px; /* Adjust based on header height */
        }
        /* Better spacing for dropdown items */
        .dropdown-content {
            margin-left: 10px;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 12px 10px;
        }
    }

    /* Add margin to page content to prevent header overlap */
    body {
        padding-top: 90px;
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        body {
            padding-top: 62px; /* Match the header height */
        }
    }
</style>

<!-- JavaScript for Mobile Menu -->
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
        const navContainer = document.querySelector('.nav-container');
        const dropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown');
        
        // Toggle mobile menu
        menuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
            navContainer.classList.toggle('active');
            // Prevent body scrolling when menu is open
            document.body.style.overflow = navContainer.classList.contains('active') ? 'hidden' : '';
        });
        
        // Handle dropdowns on mobile
        dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
            const link = dropdown.querySelector('.nav-link, .dropdown-link');
            link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                    if (dropdown.classList.contains('dropdown') && 
                        dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-content')) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent event bubbling
                        
                        // Close other same-level dropdowns
                        const parentUl = dropdown.parentNode;
                        const siblings = parentUl.querySelectorAll(':scope > .dropdown');
                        siblings.forEach(sibling => {
                            if (sibling !== dropdown) {
                                sibling.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        dropdown.classList.toggle('active');
                    }
                }
            });
        });
        
        // Close menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768 && 
                !navContainer.contains(e.target) && 
                !menuToggle.contains(e.target) && 
                navContainer.classList.contains('active')) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
        
        // Update menu behavior on window resize
        window.addEventListener('resize', function() {

                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });

Home Our Experiences Laser Light Show The Safest Experience in the Sky Unique Benefits of Hosting a Laser Show Neon Nights Foam Parties Water Games Dripping in Confidence Gunge Sensory Friendly Experiences Do It Now Coming Soon Special Occasions Upcoming Events Holiday Events America's 250th Anniversary Fundraisers Emmy The Owl Contact Us More... Our Story Our Team Gallery Blog Careers America's 250th Anniversary America's 250th Anniversary Laser Show Safety - Emerald Owl Productions ⚠️ Laser Show Safety & Benefits Ensuring the safety of our audience and staff is our top priority.
Learn about our comprehensive laser safety protocols and discover the amazing benefits of incorporating laser shows into your events. View Safety Guidelines Explore Laser Benefits Celebrate America's 250th anniversary with a star-spangled light show! In honor of the United States' 250th anniversary, we're proud to present our most spectacular EOP Experience yet: Celebrate America: A Laser Show Experience Like No Other Touring up and down the coast in 2026, this breathtaking show fuses cutting-edge laser technology with patriotic music, heart-pounding effects, and a sky-filling spectacle. Whether you're hosting a community or school celebration, a city-wide festival, or a private gathering, this is your chance to be part of a once-in-a-generation milestone. July 4th? Absolutely. We are accepting July 4th dates for larger-scale clients ready to go big and make a huge impact. Budget Friendly Options? Got You Covered. Can your dates be flexible? If so, we offer special pricing for events outside the most in-demand dates. Let's find a time that works for your community and your budget. Multiple Nights = Major Savings Laser shows come with many fixed production costs—so multi-night events are extremely cost-effective. Whether you're planning a full weekend celebration or want to bring the show to neighboring towns, bundling nights stretches your budget much further than many other experiences. Bundle the Magic: Add-On Experiences That Wow Want to make your event even more unforgettable? Bundle the Celebrate America laser show with interactive and themed experiences to create a full day or night of excitement: ✨ Blast to the Past: Out with the New, In with the Old – Step into a retro celebration! Think vintage games, nostalgic vibes, and timeless fun—capped off by a cutting-edge laser finale. ✨ Neon Nights: A glowing and extremely interactive dance party, appropriate for all ages ✨ Foam Party: Bubbly, high-energy fun for all ages Special Initiatives 🌟 "Do It Now" A powerful reminder to say the things that matter to the people who matter. 🌟 "Dripping in Confidence" A mental health awareness initiative and vibrant photo op. 🌟 "The Green Light Movement" A symbol of support and unity, reminding everyone that no one is truly alone. Let's Light Up 2026 — Together Whether you're planning a July 4th blowout or exploring creative ways to celebrate America's 250th, we're here to help you make history. Contact us at: 🔒 Safety Information ✨ Show Benefits A sneak-peek at how your 2026 4th of July celebration could unfold! Features To Keep In Mind: • Weather Resilience: Lasers can operate in light to moderate rain, snow, and/or wind, ensuring the show goes on despite unpredictable weather conditions. In fact, wet conditions create thousands of water droplets in the air for lasers to reflect! Rain, snow, or natural fog will actually ENHANCE your laser show in a magical way! • Environmental Considerations: Laser shows eliminate the debris and pollution associated with fireworks, offering an eco-friendly alternative. • Noise Sensitivity: The silent nature of laser shows makes them suitable for communities with noise ordinances or for individuals sensitive to loud sounds. Gallery We will travel to where you are to give you an unforgettable experience!
